text.0: like the suns glance like wealth of varied sort like breath which is the life like ones own son.
text.1: like a swift bird a cow who yields her milk pure and refulgent to the wood he speeds.
text.2: he offers safety like a pleasant home like ripened corn the conqueror of men.
text.3: like a seer lauding famed among the folk like a steed friendly he vouchsafes us power.
text.4: with flame insatiate like eternal might caring for each one like a dame at home.
text.5: bright when he shines forth whitish mid the folk like a car golddecked thundering to the fight.
text.6: he strikes with terror like a dart shot forth een like an archers arrow tipped with flame.
text.7: master of present and of future life the maidens lover and the matrons lord.
text.8: to him lead all your ways may we attain the kindled god as cows their home at eve.
text.9: he drives the flames below as floods their swell the rays rise up to the fair place of heaven.
